name: wernerdweight/ra
description: PHP Array object with consistent and predictable API

scripts.fixall: phpcbf --standard=vendor/wernerdweight/cs/WernerDweight/CS/src/ruleset.xml --colors --extensions=php --encoding=utf-8 --tab-width=4 -sp Exception/ Tests/ RA.php; ./vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=vendor/wernerdweight/cs/WernerDweight/CS/.php_cs.dist --verbose --diff Exception/ Tests/ RA.php
scripts.phpstan: phpstan analyse Exception/ Tests/ RA.php --level max
